Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
game.audio.SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
Manages game audio using the SoundClip class.

The SoundManager class follows the Singleton pattern to ensure that only one instance manages all background music and sound effects. It provides controls for playback and volume adjustment of both background music and various sound effects (SFX). The sounds are loaded in a background thread during initialization to prevent the UI from freezing while waiting for sound files to load.

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundManager

      private SoundManager()
      Private constructor that loads the background music.

      This is private because SoundManager follows the Singleton pattern, so only one instance is allowed.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SoundManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of SoundManager, creating it if necessary.
      Returns:
      The single instance of SoundManager.

    • loopBackgroundMusic

      public void loopBackgroundMusic()
      Starts the background music in a continuous loop. Does nothing if the music failed to load.

    • stopBackgroundMusic

      public void stopBackgroundMusic()
      Stops the background music if it is playing.

    • setBackgroundVolume

      public void setBackgroundVolume(double volume)
      Adjusts the volume of the background music.

      Clamps the multiplier to a minimum of 0.0001 to avoid illegal values. A volume of 1.0 indicates 100%; 2.0 indicates 200%, etc.

      Parameters:
      volume - A multiplier for the default background music volume.

    • setSFXVolume

      public void setSFXVolume(double volume)
      Adjusts the volume of all sound effects (SFX).

      Clamps the multiplier to a minimum of 0.0001.

      Parameters:
      volume - A multiplier for the default SFX volume.

    • playJumpSound

      public void playJumpSound()
      Plays the jump sound effect once, if loaded.

    • playCollisionSound

      public void playCollisionSound()
      Plays the collision sound effect once, if loaded.

    • playEnemyDestroyedSound

      public void playEnemyDestroyedSound()
      Plays the enemy destroyed sound effect once, if loaded.

    • playCollectibleSound

      public void playCollectibleSound()
      Plays the collectible sound effect once, if loaded.

    • playLevelCompleteSound

      public void playLevelCompleteSound()
      Plays the level complete sound effect once, if loaded.

    • playButtonSound

      public static void playButtonSound()
      Plays the button sound effect.

    • playGameOverSound

      public void playGameOverSound()
      Plays the game over sound effect once, if loaded, and prevents replay until resetGameOverSound() is called.

    • stopCollisionSound

      public void stopCollisionSound()
      Stops the collision sound if it is playing.

    • stopGameOverSound

      public void stopGameOverSound()
      Stops the game over sound if it is playing.

    • resetGameOverSound

      public void resetGameOverSound()
      Resets the game over sound playback flag, allowing it to be played again.
